Name: Oneteam Soccer
About the game: Let's play ONETEAM SOCCER. All players move together since they're 'ONETEAM'. 【MODE】 ・ online battle MODE You can play with the players around the world. Be the best of 'ONETEAM'!!! ・ VS CPU MODE You can play even if you're in offline. Select the CPU level (beginner, professional, G O D) 【OPERATION】 　W : Run 　A : Turn（L) 　S : Back 　D : Turn（R） 　R : Hold 　T : Kick ※You can see them in [Show Config] in the game. What is 'ONETEAM'? It means 'becoming one team'. When a group accomplishes one thing, the word is used for uniting everyone's strengths as one. Therefore, it is used as a slogan to improve the unity of the team.
